faq.question: How do I write an OpenEJB FAQ?

answer.p: Just use a document like this one!

p.file:
FAQ OpenEJB with Music Do you know the sofware has a bug in it?

No, but if you hum a few bars, maybe I can fake it.

How do I get to Carnagie Hall?

Practice, man! Practice.

faq.question: Where do I send my FAQ?

answer.p: Just submit it to the OpenEJB Issue Tracking System, it will be up in no time!
